name: Cerebral Dissonance
description:
Cerebral Dissonance is a unique shooter controlled entirely with the mouse. Currently there is no real objective apart from to have fun and see what you can do.

Recommended to play while listening to music.

Please note that due to being incomplete, very few features are explained in-game.

Click on the title to enter the transition room. Click on the dot to begin. Right and left mouse buttons change firing direction. Press Esc to return to the title screen. Press R to reset on death.

To quit hold escape and click the quit button.

Gameplay Affecting Commands:
(Using Non-Keypad in Main Game)
1 - Toggle Scatter Mode
2 - Toggle Enemy Spawns
3 - Toggle Flurry Mode
9 - Stop Firing
0 - Stop Taking Damage
R - Reset room
Esc - Return to title (Will maintain bullet and enemy positions)

Changing Visuals:
(Using Keypad on title screen)
It's important to change the luminosity before hue or saturation, or effects won't be seen.
+ - Select Background
- - Select Foreground
/ - Enable HueShift Background
* - Enable HueShift Foreground
7 - Move Hue towards 0
9 - Move Hue towards 255
4 - Decrease Saturation
6 - Increase Saturation
1 - Decrease Luminosity
3 - Increase Luminosity
(Using non-keypad in main game)
8 - Toggle EarlyBullet view mode

Advanced Properties:
(Using Non-Keypad in Main Game)
7 - Increase Fire-rate (May cause major lag)
8 - Reset Fire-rate
9 - Decrease Fire-rate
4 - Increase Turn-speed negatively
5 - Reset Turn-speed
6 - Increase Turn-speed positively
1 - Increase bullet acceleration negatively
2 - Reset bullet acceleration
3 - Increase bullet acceleration positively
